channel.title: CVE Feed for Trellix -- Trellix EDR UI (XConsole)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trellix -- Trellix EDR UI (XConsole)

item.title: CVE-2024-4176|2024-07-31T19:34:04.208Z -- trellix -- trellix%20edr%20ui%20%20%28xconsole%29
item.description: An Cross site scripting vulnerability in the EDR XConsole before this release allowed an attacker to potentially leverage an XSS/HTML-Injection using command line variables. A malicious threat actor could execute commands on the victim's browser for sending carefully crafted malicious links to the EDR XConsole end user.

item.title: CVE-2024-4176|2024-06-13T08:59:37.481Z -- trellix -- trellix%20edr%20ui%20%20%28xconsole%29
item.description: An Cross site scripting vulnerability in the EDR XConsole before this release allowed an attacker to potentially leverage an XSS/HTML-Injection using command line variables. A malicious threat actor could execute commands on the victim's browser for sending carefully crafted malicious links to the EDR XConsole end user.
